mapper.update: update c_equip set equipid=equipid ,storageid=#{storageid} ,equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} ,equipcode=#{equipcode} ,equipname=#{equipname} ,equipspec=#{equipspec} ,indate=#{indate} ,usestate=#{usestate} ,usedate=#{usedate} ,orgivalue=#{orgivalue} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,motorcount=#{motorcount} ,motorpower=#{motorpower} ,location=#{location} ,factory=#{factory} ,facaddr=#{facaddr} ,faczip=#{faczip} ,factel=#{factel} ,faclinkman=#{faclinkman} ,outfaccode=#{outfaccode} ,producingdate=#{producingdate} ,outfacdate=#{outfacdate} ,expdate=#{expdate} ,equipbrand=#{equipbrand} ,description=#{description} ,picpath=#{picpath} ,gaveupstate=#{gaveupstate} ,gaveupdate=#{gaveupdate} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,sequno=#{sequno} where equipid=#{equipid}

update c_equip set equipid=equipid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,equiptypeid=#{equiptypeid} ,equipcode=#{equipcode} ,equipname=#{equipname} ,equipspec=#{equipspec} ,indate=#{indate} ,usestate=#{usestate} ,usedate=#{usedate} ,orgivalue=#{orgivalue} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,motorcount=#{motorcount} ,motorpower=#{motorpower} ,location=#{location} ,factory=#{factory} ,facaddr=#{facaddr} ,faczip=#{faczip} ,factel=#{factel} ,faclinkman=#{faclinkman} ,outfaccode=#{outfaccode} ,producingdate=#{producingdate} ,outfacdate=#{outfacdate} ,expdate=#{expdate} ,equipbrand=#{equipbrand} ,description=#{description} ,picpath=#{picpath} ,gaveupstate=#{gaveupstate} ,gaveupdate=#{gaveupdate} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,sequno=#{sequno} where 1=1 and equipid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and equipid =#{Where_Id} and equipid=#{Where_equipid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and location=#{Where_location} and factory=#{Where_factory} and facaddr=#{Where_facaddr} and faczip=#{Where_faczip} and factel=#{Where_factel} and faclinkman=#{Where_faclinkman} and outfaccode=#{Where_outfaccode} and producingdate=#{Where_producingdate} and outfacdate=#{Where_outfacdate} and expdate=#{Where_expdate} and equipbrand=#{Where_equipbrand} and description=#{Where_description} and picpath=#{Where_picpath} and gaveupstate=#{Where_gaveupstate} and gaveupdate=#{Where_gaveupdate} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.equipid "equipid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid", t.equipcode "equipcode", t.equipname "equipname", t.equipspec "equipspec", t.indate "indate", t.usestate "usestate", t.usedate "usedate", t.orgivalue "orgivalue", t.measunit "measunit", t.motorcount "motorcount", t.motorpower "motorpower", t.location "location", t.factory "factory", t.facaddr "facaddr", t.faczip "faczip", t.factel "factel", t.faclinkman "faclinkman", t.outfaccode "outfaccode", t.producingdate "producingdate", t.outfacdate "outfacdate", t.expdate "expdate", t.equipbrand "equipbrand", t.description "description", t.picpath "picpath", t.gaveupstate "gaveupstate", t.gaveupdate "gaveupdate", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.sequno "sequno", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname", ls.storagename "storagename", ce.equiptypename "equiptypename" from c_equip t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join c_equiptype ce on ce.equiptypeid=t.equiptypeid where equipid=#{equipid}
